languages.text: {n}Мейв удивленно хлопает глазами.{/n} "Все так, господин судья, до сих пор гадаю, за что Бог-Император даровал мне такие почести".
{n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, my lord judicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."
languages.original_text: {n}Мейв удивленно хлопает глазами.{/n} "Все так, господин судья, до сих пор гадаю, за что Бог-Император даровал мне такие почести".

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, Master Adjudicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."
{n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, Master Adjudicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."
{n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, Master Adjudicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."
{n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, my lord judicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."
{n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, my lord judicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."

languages.text: {n}Maive zwinkert verwundert.{/n} "So ist es, mein Lord Judikator. Ich wundere mich immer noch, warum es der Gottimperator für richtig hielt, mir eine derartige Ehre zu gewähren."
languages.original_text: {n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, my lord judicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive zwinkert verwundert.{/n} "So ist es, mein Lord Richter. Ich wundere mich immer noch, warum es der Gottimperator für richtig hielt, mir eine derartige Ehre zu gewähren."

languages.text: {n}Maive cligne des yeux d'un air surpris.{/n} « C'est exact, mon seigneur juge. Je me demande toujours pourquoi l'Empereur-Dieu a cru bon de m'accorder cet immense honneur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, my lord judicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive cligne des yeux d'un air surpris.{/n} « C'est exact, mon seigneur juge. Je me demande toujours pourquoi l'Empereur-Dieu a cru bon de m'accorder cet immense honneur. »

languages.text: {n}梅芙震惊地眨了眨眼睛。{/n}“确实如此，仲裁官大人。我到现在也没想明白，为什么神皇会赐予我这样的殊荣。”
languages.original_text: {n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, my lord judicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙震惊地眨了眨眼睛。{/n}“确实如此，仲裁官大人。我到现在也没想明白，为什么神皇会赐予我这样的殊荣。”

languages.text: {n}Maive pestañea, atónita.{/n} «Así es, mi señor magistrado. Todavía me pregunto por qué el Dios Emperador ha decidido concederme semejante honor».
languages.original_text: {n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, my lord judicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive pestañea, atónita.{/n} «Así es, mi señor juez. Todavía me pregunto por qué el Dios Emperador ha decidido concederme semejante honor».

languages.text: {n}メイヴは驚き、目を瞬かせた。{/n}「そうなのです、裁判官様。神帝陛下がなぜ私にこんな大きな栄誉を授けてくださったのか、今でも不思議に思っています」
languages.original_text: {n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, my lord judicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは驚き、目を瞬かせた。{/n}「そうなのです、裁判官様。神帝陛下がなぜ私にこんな大きな栄誉を授けてくださったのか、今でも不思議に思っています」
{n}メイヴは驚き、目を瞬かせた。{/n}「そうなのです、裁判官様。神帝陛下がなぜ私にこんな大きな栄誉を授けてくださったのか、今でも不思議に思っています」

languages.text: {n}Maive, şaşkınlıkla gözlerini kırpıştırıyor.{/n} "Öyle oldu sayın hâkimim. Tanrı İmparator'un neden böyle muazzam bir onuru bana uygun gördüğünü hâlâ merak ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Maive blinks in astonishment.{/n} "That is so, my lord judicator. I still wonder why the God-Emperor saw fit to bestow such a tremendous honour upon me."
